```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(GGally)
library(visdat)

```

# Leemos datos

Comentario: Nunca usar options(warn -1) i supressWarnings()


```{r}

casas <- read.csv('kc_house_data.csv', header = T, na.strings = '?')

ggpairs(casas %>% 
        select(-id) %>%
        sample_n(1000))
```



```{r}
hist(casas$price)
qqnorm(casas$price)
qqline(casas$price)
densidad <- density(casas$price)
plot(densidad)
#log -> logaritmo natural
log_price <- log10(casas$price)
hist(log_price)

```
